articles.author: Oliver Connolly
articles.title: A grumpy and vengeful Aaron Rodgers will be in his happy place with the Jets - The Guardian
articles.description: If New York and Green Bay agree terms on a trade for the quarterback, it may be a success or a disaster. But it will definitely be entertaining
articles.content:
The long national nightmare is over. Aaron Rodgers has made his decision.
After 15 seasons as the Green Bay Packers starter, the quarterback is set to be traded to the New York Jets. He confirmed as… [+8946 chars]
